title: 'A much awaited upgrade!'
body: The boAt Stone 1800 packs a hefty sound. It is definitely boAts loudest portable bluetooth speaker till date. The broadcast function allows you to pair over 100 boAt Stone 1800s instead of the traditional 2 with TWS speakers. The speaker favours the mid frequency/vocals. Bass is also very punchy but at Max volume there is a hint of muddiness. But at 80% it's fine. Battery life could be a concern. Microphone works well. Overall a worthy upgrade from the boAt Stone 1500.
